description: This dish has something for everyone: Mexican chilli con carne flavours, juicy meatballs, risoni pasta and fresh tomatoes. The complete package!
name: Tex Mex Meatball Risoni Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 40 g sachet Continental recipe base chilli con carne

recipeInstructions.text: Add risoni and meatballs and cook, stirring frequently, for 12 minutes or until risoni is tender. Top with remaining tomatoes. Season, then serve.
